root.name: Mystery P.I.: The Lottery Ticket
root.description: OverviewMystery P.I.: The Lottery Ticket is a hidden objects game developed by SpinTop Games and published by PopCap Games (US original/Steam releases), ValuSoft (US jewel case release), and Focus Multimedia (EU release) for the PC platform.

similar_games.game: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Death in Scarlet
